headline: Samvardhana Motherson International Limited proposed a bid to acquire Marelli Holdings Co., Ltd. from KKR & Co. Inc. and others.
summary: Samvardhana Motherson International Limited proposed a bid to acquire Marelli Holdings Co., Ltd. from KKR & Co. Inc. and others on June 24, 2025. As part of acquisition, some form of debt relief is...
